title: Episode 148: Rappers Gunna, Young Thug hit w RICO
itunes:title: Episode 148: Rappers Gunna, Young Thug hit w RICO
description:
In this episode we talk about the recent trend of rappers being hit with RICO charges and Eiht discusses how lyrics during him and Quiks legendary feud caused drama and even death in the streets. Make sure you stay up on the latest news www.thisomebull.com

Check out MC Eiht's new EP "Revolution In Progress" shorturl.at/fiGT5

Check out Eiht's new video w/ Kurupt "Double That" https://youtu.be/dSUd_u4SB68 

Visit the store for all kinda dope gear shorturl.at/uLQ28
